Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
This class manage the game evolution. Sends messages through the Virtual Views. Reads messages coming from the Client.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GameController()
    Default constructor.

    • newPlayer

      public void newPlayer​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String gameId, VirtualView virtualView)
      Adds a new Virtual View.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the Player's Virtual View.
      gameId - id belonging to the game the Player just joined.
      virtualView - Player's Virtual View.

      initial phase.
      Parameters:
      msg -

    • startTurn

      public void startTurn()
      Starts the turn, the action depends on the state of the game. Always clears the array of temporary cards.

    • placeResWarehouse

      public void placeResWarehouse​(Player player, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​ResourceType> depotToResource, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> depotToQuantity, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> resourceToLeader, int discard)
      Adds resources to a player's warehouse.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to give resources to.
      depotToResource - map from depot floor to resource.
      depotToQuantity - map from depot floor to quantity.
      resourceToLeader - quantity of resources for each leader depot.
      discard - how many resources were discarded

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      Returns:
      false if game hasn't started yet.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect​(java.lang.String username)
      Removes the player from the game and checks if he was the active player, in which case starts a new turn.
      Parameters:
      username - the username who disconnected

    • getInactivePlayers

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInactivePlayers()
      Returns:
      A List of usernames of disconnected players from an ongoing game

    • hasInactivePlayers

      public boolean hasInactivePlayers()
      Returns:
      if the game is ongoing and has disconnected players.

      public void reconnect​(java.lang.String username, VirtualView virtualView)
      Reconnects a player who previously disconnected to an ongoing game.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player reconnecting.
      virtualView - the view of the player reconnecting.

      Parameters:

    • getMarketResources

      public void getMarketResources​(GetMarketResRequest msg, Player player)
      Asks the player in which depots he would like to store the resources obtained with a market action.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message containing the row or column sent from the active player
      player - the player object associated to the active player

    • getMarketDevCard

      public void getMarketDevCard​(BuyDevCardRequest msg, Player player)
      Asks the player in which slot he would like to store the card, if no card is available sends an error message.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message containing the color and the level of the card requested.
      player - the player object associated to the active player

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard​(PlaceDevCardRequest msg, DevCard card, Player player)
      Places the card in the requested slot and triggers the endgame turns if the player has 7 cards.
      Parameters:
      msg - the message containing the requested slot.
      player - the player object associated to the active player

    • increaseFaith

      public void increaseFaith​(int faithQuantity, boolean activateOnYourself)
      Increases faith of active player, or every other player (Moves the black cross in case of SinglePlayer Game
      Parameters:
      faithQuantity - the quantity to add to the current faith space
      activateOnYourself - if true, increases faith of active player, if false, increase of every other player.

    • produceResources

      public void produceResources​(java.util.ArrayList<DevCard> cards, Player player)
      Checks if the player can pay the production cost of the chosen cards and, if so, asks the player how he would like to pay
      Parameters:
      cards - the chosen dev cards
      player - the player object associated to the active player

    • confirmProduction

      public void confirmProduction​(java.util.HashMap<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> depotExpense, java.util.HashMap<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> strongbox, Player player)
      Sets the player's strongbox to a new one after resources have been spent and produced. Removes resources paid from depot
      Parameters:
      depotExpense - payment of a resource from the warehouse
      strongbox - new strongbox
      player - the player object associated to the active player

    • sendLeaderCards

      public void sendLeaderCards​(java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leader)
      Sends the leader cards in the hand to a player
      Parameters:
      leader - the cards

    • checkCardColorRequirements

      public boolean checkCardColorRequirements​(Player player, java.util.HashMap<Color,​java.lang.Integer> requirement)
      checks if the player has enough cards of certain colors
      Parameters:
      player - the player object associated to the active player
      requirement - the color requirement
      Returns:
      true if the player has the required cards

    • checkLevelTwoColor

      public boolean checkLevelTwoColor​(Color color, Player player)
      checks if the player has a level two card of a certain color
      Parameters:
      player - the player object associated to the active player
      color - the color requirement
      Returns:
      true if the player has the required card
